name: The Secret Estate
description:
DESCRIPTION
Getting married at this magical estate is an unforgettable way to share one of the most important moments of your life with your loved ones and where a love of authenticity, nature, tradition, Franche-Comté will allow you to make memories for life.
Spectacular scenery, inspiring architecture, beautiful gardens and an immaculate golf course come together to create a stunning backdrop for your celebrations.
At the estate there is a team specially dedicated to this exceptional event will support you. Florists, caterers, music, lighting, surprises… Every sequence, every detail is worked out with you.
We have been here, in Franche-Comté, for ten generations. Over time, our family has never stopped building and imagining new projects so that the estate will live and be a source of pleasures and discoveries. The old 100% agricultural farm has gradually been transformed: gardens, vegetable garden, hotel, restaurant, golf course, forest ... So many places and proposals to taste the joy of being together and doing good.It is now our turn to welcome you for your wedding celebration and to enrich your experience with our passions and know-how.
Inside there are three reception rooms are at your disposal: 45 m², 80 m², 110 m², for a capacity of up to 50 people. Each room can be equipped with video projection and sound.
Catering services are provided on site by the Brasserie and we can help to develop a tailor-made package together.
The Hotel
Behind the thick walls of the 18th century castle, there are 16 rooms including 3 suites, from 25 to 50 m². Comfortable, peaceful, all are imbued with the spirit of the estate and made authentic with the passing of time. Each bedroom is uniquely decorated and the one suite includes a four-poster bed which makes it perfect for the bridal suite. You will find silence and tranquillity in each room, but also a television, a kettle, and Wi-Fi.
And in the bathrooms our selection of welcome products, and a hairdryer. All our rooms are non-smoking.
Breakfast is included for you and your guests.
On-demand treatments from our therapists are available for you and your guests at Better Life Sessions.
The Golf course offers an exceptional 18-hole course set in an English-style park.
In the heart of nature, in the middle of hundred-year-old trees, take a long, regenerating and sporty walk: PAR 72 laid out on interesting uneven is well balanced, PAR 5 accessible in 2 shots for long hitters, PAR 3 well defended by bunkers and PAR 4 bordered by water that challenge the game. Between two swings, you can enjoy the serenity of the countryside and the views of the Domaine's castles.
Package includes:
A two day, one night stay with exclusive use of the chateau, including the 7 suites and brunch the following morning. Chairs and tables are included for up to 250 people.
Prices start from 15,000 euros HT.
For further information please do get in touch and we will be more than happy to help. We look forward to hearing from you.
